title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama LLM & embeddings in LangChain expressions.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; multi-model chats, PDF ingestion, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and custom timeout support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG prototype using Ollama + ChromaDB + LangChain to chat over your documents locally.

title: chatbot-ollama
summary: FastAPI + React chatbot template that proxies to Ollama with history persistence and Docker compose.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with syntax highlighting, prompt history, and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline code copilot with explain/refactor commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama REST API with async HTTP and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed generate/chat/embed endpoints with tokio streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with dependency injection helpers and Blazor sample chat app.

title: ollama-digital-assistant
summary: Raspberry Pi image + Flask app giving offline voice assistant powered by Ollama & Whisper.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community registry browser and downloader for custom GGUF/MLX models compatible with Ollama.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot bringing local Ollama models to your server with slash commands and moderation.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that threads Ollama replies, supports DM and channel mentions with rate limits.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes for summarization and brainstorming.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI with session memory, model selector, and side-by-side comparison mode for Ollama.
